description: {"blocks":[{"key":"q61k","text":"Samples are processed using V2 barcoding chemistry kits of 10x Genomics. For each run, 10,000 cells from individual donors are labeled with distinct oligo-barcoded antibodies (cell hashing), enabling us to pool samples from both conditions on each 10X Genomics run and reduce batch effects. All samples from a given experiment are processed in parallel in the same thermal cycler. The 10x user guide can be found https://assets.ctfassets.net/an68im79xiti/1C16trEdzy1Folq5xbOijE/7e6fb1f504e130bd561d898384da99d9/CG000315_ChromiumNextGEMSingleCell3-_GeneExpression_v3.1_DualIndex__RevB.pdf and is also an attached document.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":413,"length":174}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"91FC6872C71C11ECB7380A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://assets.ctfassets.net/an68im79xiti/1C16trEdzy1Folq5xbOijE/7e6fb1f504e130bd561d898384da99d9/CG000315_ChromiumNextGEMSingleCell3-_GeneExpression_v3.1_DualIndex__RevB.pdf"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"216lu","text":"Single cell suspensions are multiplexed and converted to barcoded scRNAseq libraries using the Chromium Single Cell 3’ Library, Gel Bead and Chip Kit (10x Genomics), and the BD™ Hu Single Cell Sample Multiplexing Kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":174,"length":42}],"data":{}},{"key":"ap315","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"10edo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eemac","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9C2BF873C72B11ECB7380A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.bdbiosciences.com/en-us/products/reagents/single-cell-multiomics-reagents/bd-single-cell-multiplexing-kits/hu-single-cell-sample-multiplexing-kit.633781"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3d86c","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":174,"offset":75}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cjiim","text":"Chromium Next GEM Single Cell 3’ Reagent Kits v3.1 (Dual Index) User Guide https://assets.ctfassets.net/an68im79xiti/1C16trEdzy1Folq5xbOijE/7e6fb1f504e130bd561d898384da99d9/CG000315_ChromiumNextGEMSingleCell3-_GeneExpression_v3.1_DualIndex__RevB.pdf ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"64F012F1C71D11ECB7380A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://assets.ctfassets.net/an68im79xiti/1C16trEdzy1Folq5xbOijE/7e6fb1f504e130bd561d898384da99d9/CG000315_ChromiumNextGEMSingleCell3-_GeneExpression_v3.1_DualIndex__RevB.pdf"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"}}}}}}
